title: Bug 6304 - Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file with another resource, such as a .properties file, in the package viewer, an error occurs.
OB: Currently, it is not possible to synchronize a .java file and another resource, such as a .properties file, in the package viewer.
EB: The synchronization feature should allow for the synchronization of a .java file and any other resource in the package viewer.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer.
2. Attempt to synchronize the two resources.
